meanings.sent1: The weavers in the village create beautiful textiles.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother was a skilled weaver who made blankets and scarves.
meanings.sent3: The weavers at the loom were so focused that they didn't notice the cat playing with the yarn.
meanings.sent4: The weavers of stories spun tales that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The weavers' hands moved swiftly, turning threads into intricate patterns.

meanings.definition: A machine used for weaving fabric.
meanings.sent1: The weavers in the factory operate the machines to create large rolls of cloth.
meanings.sent2: The old weaving machine in the museum shows how weavers used to work.
meanings.sent3: The weavers hummed a tune as the machine rhythmically wove the threads together.
meanings.sent4: The weavers of dreams worked tirelessly to bring the fabric of imagination to life.
meanings.sent5: The weavers' looms clacked and clattered, producing yards of fabric.
